items.text: hello there! Length ball on middle, and he stays on the back foot before pulling over midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, SIX runs

items.text: excuse me! Length ball, wide outside off but Stirling swivels to smash a shot over the non-striker's head. Ball lost!
items.postText: Suresh Guna: "What happened to Niall O'Brien, has he retired?" -- indeed
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, SIX runs

items.text: Shakib trying something different. Came from over the wicket, but bowls it too wide
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, 1 wide

items.text: see you later! Full, on leg, and Stirling sweeps this behind square! Man in the deep, but he's just a spectator
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, FOUR runs

items.text: full, on leg, and drilled to long on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Stirling, 1 run

items.text: most expensive over off Shakib Al Hasan in ODI history! Full, on off, and he picks up a flicked shot to long on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to O'Brien, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, outside leg stump with KoB exposing his stumps. Bowler follows him, and all O'Brien can do is nudge it down to fine leg
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to O'Brien, 1 leg bye

items.text: slower ball, full on off, and Stirling goes for the big shot. Toe-ends it, and it's in the air for ages. Mashrafe from cover tries to run to take the catch, but the ball falls beyond him
full on leg, and the leg-side whip takes a leading edge to point. Stirling living dangerously
items.postText: Kapil: "So, Lets talk about 300 again , Shall We :)"

items.text: got him! Back of a length on middle, and O'Brien tries to flat-bat a six over long on. But he toe-ends the shot, and it's gone straight to the man riding the boundary

dismissal.text: KJ O'Brien c Tamim Iqbal b Abu Jayed 3 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 75.00

items.text: back of a length on middle, and soaring over Stirling's head. Wide given
items.postText: Ratan Bepary : "Sometimes captain needs to understand, every bowler comes bad day. That day don't use that bowler. "

items.text: back of the hand slower ball, and it lands full on leg stump. Stirling tries to muscle this over cow corner, but he doesn't have the power behind the shot. In the air for eternity before the sweeper-fielder on the leg side gets under it. Jayed strikes again. Standing ovation for Stirling
items.postText: TQ: "Hoping Ireland score 300. Bangladesh don't chase 300s that much and they will need to be ready for that in the WC"

dismissal.text: PR Stirling c Liton Das b Abu Jayed 130 (141b 8x4 4x6) SR: 92.19

items.preText: Gary Wilson, at the non striker's end
items.text: overpitched on off, and drilled to long on
back of a length, outside off and angling in. Adair stands tall, and pull over wide long on. Smoked it
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Adair, SIX runs

items.text: slower ball, nearly a yorker on leg. And struck past the bowler. Impressive effort near the boundary - from Mahmudullah - saves two
items.postText: Mahneel: "Why are the Bangladeshi fans so livid? A higher target will give us a chance to test our ability in chasing big runs. Not like the English pitches will be bowling friendly anyway"

items.text: another attempted yorker. Driven to long on once more
items.postText: Rakib: "This spell may confirm Jayed's place in world cup squad. Taskin is not going to make it now."

items.text: low full toss on middle, and off the mark immediately. Driven to long on
low full toss because of the attempted yorker. Drilled to long on

items.postText: Tom: "Even if Ireland sneak to 300 I doubt it will be enough given the way the other two games on this ground have gone. Ireland simply don't have the penetration with the ball to defend on a good surface "

items.text: slower ball, length outside off, and he plays a late cut down to the third-man boundary
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Wilson, FOUR runs

items.text: another one! Useful runs. Back of a length, trying to go short to Wilson, but he manages to hook a shot over short fine leg
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Wilson, FOUR runs

items.text: Jayed has the last laugh! Full on middle, and the attempted cover drive is sliced to point. Five-wicket haul
items.postText: Brendan: "@Tom. At least we can hope in the effort to defend 300. And if there is good batting from BD, we can enjoy that too. "

dismissal.text: GC Wilson c Shakib Al Hasan b Abu Jayed 12 (6b 2x4 0x6) SR: 200.00

items.preText: Amir: "@Tom - IRE may not have strong bowling, but you may not be familiar with BD's ability to implode at inopportune time. My crystal ball says Bd will fold in less than 200 today due to rash shots."
items.text: full, on off, and lifted over the bowler's head. Fielder - Tamim - at long off does well to run across the boundary and intercept
items.postText: Isam: First five-for by a Bangladeshi fast bowler since Mustafizur's five-for against India in November 2015

items.text: full on leg, and flicked away to deep midwicket. They scamper across for one
items.postText: Wahid Quayum: "Jayed has one more over to set a world record of 7 wickets on debut!"
